get.description: Get List of all available Departments.

parameters.description: Authentication Token List would be provided by BIZZSOL

parameters.description: Authentication Token List would be provided by BIZZSOL

    -d "min_range"="0" \
    -d "max_range"="10000000"

get.description: Get the List of all available Users.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication Token List would be provided by BIZZSOL

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://bizzsol.com.bd/sslz/api/users"

units.description: Array of Units of the User

sections.description: Array of Sections of the User

roles.description: Array of Roles of the User

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication Token List would be provided by BIZZSOL

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://bizzsol.com.bd/sslz/api/users" 
    -d "name"="John Doe" \
    -d "uid"="1001" \
    -d "email"="example@email.com" \
    -d "phone"="01234567890" \
    -d "password"="12345678" \
    -d "password_confirmation"="12345678" \
    -d "units"="[1, 2, 3]" \
    -d "sections"="[1, 2, 3]" \
    -d "roles"="["Admin", "Employee"]"
